WorkItem.Description:
RAWR is acting weird. Optimizer leaves my Stinger of the flaming scorpion wand not reforged, giving me 32840 dps for my settings. I reforge the crit to haste and now it shows as 32843dps. I run the optimizer again and it still wants me to not reforge it, even though it does acknowledge it as a dps loss?
Â 
This is all at max thoroughness. Char file attached.

Comments.Message: This is a known issue that is not fixable, I should probably add this to the FAQ at some point. Check http://rawr.codeplex.com/workitem/21213 for more details and some posts in Rawr.Mage thread on EJ.
